main.error_connection: Error connecting to Lexon. The data is not updated.

connecting.q1: What do you want to do with the selected messages? (Available soon)
connecting.q2: What type of entity do you want to connect with? (Available soon)
connecting.copy: Save copy of the messages in documentation

connecting.q5: Do you want to rename the new performances?
connecting.qs5: The actions created take by default the subject of classified messages. If you wish, you can edit these titles.

classify-emails.title: New classification
classify-emails.body: Select classification type to load the corresponding list and assign the messages to one of the items in the list.
classify-emails.classification-saved-ko: There was an error saving the classification
classify-emails.classification-removed-ko: There was an error removing the classification
classify-emails.classification-selection-ko: You must select a Type and Entity to qualify

tab-classify.select-mail: Select a message and rate it in Lex-on. The relationship established will be visible in this panel and also in the application.

tab-connect.select-mail: Select a message and rate it in Lex-on. The relationship established will be visible in this panel and also in the application.

confirm-remove-classification.text-confirm-remove: If you delete this link, you will stop viewing the email in the corresponding Lex-on classification. Do you want to continue?

tab-document.select-mail: Select one or more messages and save them as a separate copy in the Lex-on documentation.

list-classifications.no-classifications: There are no classifications associated with this email
